summary.span: 做為自訂 ASP.NET Web 組件控制項的基底類別，在基底 類別功能中加入一些其他使用者介面 (UI) 屬性、建立連接的功能，以及個人化行為。

span.span: Serves as the base class for custom ASP.NET Web Parts controls, adding to the base class features some additional user interface (UI) properties, the ability to create connections, and personalization behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的控制項與 Web 組件功能時，您會有兩個基本選項。When you create controls with Web Parts functionality, you have two basic options. 您可以建立自訂控制項衍生自類別，或者您可以建立或使用其他伺服器控制項。You can create custom controls that derive from the class, or you can create or use other server controls. 現有的 ASP.NET 控制項、 自訂的伺服器控制項和使用者控制項可以全部提供完整的 Web 組件功能藉由宣告中將它們 （或以程式設計的方式，將它們加入）區域控制項，它們會包裝與結果在執行階段物件，並視為 true控制項。Existing ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls can all be given full Web Parts functionality by declaring them within (or adding them programmatically to) a zone control, with the result that they will be wrapped with objects at run time and treated as true controls. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件類別。For details, see the documentation for the class. 開發的速度和最大的重複使用程式碼，使用現有的伺服器控制項可能會很好的選項。For speed of development and maximum reuse of code, using existing server controls can be a good option. 如需最大以程式設計方式控制的行為和 Web 組件控制項的功能，建立自訂控制項繼承自類別通常是最佳選擇。For maximum programmatic control over the behavior and Web Parts functionality of controls, creating a custom control that inherits from the class is often the best option. 抽象類別繼承自基底控制項，並提供所有基本項目控制項。The abstract class inherits from the base control and provides the basic elements for all controls. 類別包含一組常用的屬性，可影響的使用者介面的外觀。The class includes a common set of properties that affect the appearance of the UI. ， ， ， ， ，和每個屬性會指定是否允許使用者的 Web 應用程式互動方式指定屬性所指定組件控制項名稱。The , , , , , and properties each specify whether the user of a Web application is permitted to interact with the part control in the way indicated by the given property name. ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性會決定大小，可見性外觀和內容 （例如標題和描述） 的支援的控制項。The , , , , , , , , , , and properties determine the size, visibility, appearance, and supporting content (such as a title and a description) for a control. 關聯性控制項為其內容中 Web 組件控制項集合由屬性例如，其中保留的參考控制項的相關聯物件，和，它會參考含有控制項。The relationship of a control to its context within the Web Parts control set is determined by properties such as , which holds a reference to the control's associated object, and , which references the that contains the control. 可以有只有一個控制每個頁面，以及每個執行個體控制項可以位於內只有一個一次。There can be only one control per page, and each instance of a control can reside within only one at a time. > [!NOTE] > A控制項可以放在網頁上，區域外，但在此情況下當做一般的伺服器控制項的功能，會失去幾乎所有的 Web 組件功能。A control can be placed outside of a zone on a Web page, but in this case it functions as a normal server control and loses nearly all Web Parts functionality. 其他幾個重要的屬性會影響的唯一功能控制項。Several other important properties affect unique features of controls. 屬性可讓開發人員設定可以在執行階段做為篩選條件使用，以判斷是否要將控制項加入至頁面的任意字串。The property allows developers to set an arbitrary string that can be used as a filter at run time to determine whether a control is added to the page. 與角色管理等功能搭配使用屬性提供有用的機制，以建立定義的使用者角色為基礎的檢視。Used together with a feature such as role management, the property provides a useful mechanism for creating views based on defined user roles. 屬性會指出是否在匯出期間，在控制項上的所有可用的屬性資料匯出，或非機密資料。The property indicates whether, during an export, all the available property data on a control is exported, or only the non-sensitive data. 這可讓開發人員為機密的資料與不是，基於安全的資料之間進行區別。This allows developers to distinguish between data that is sensitive and data that is not, for security purposes. 屬性傳回的執行個體的參考控制項，以便頁面處於編輯模式時，控制項可以編輯它。The property returns a reference to an instance of a control, so that an control can edit it when the page is in edit mode. 最後，有數個屬性，表示相對於頁面的其餘部分控制項的狀態。Finally, there are several properties that indicate the status of the control relative to the rest of the page. 屬性會指出控制項是否已關閉 (並因此加入物件)，或者如果它是開放且可使用網頁上。The property indicates whether a control is closed (and thus added to a object), or if it is open and available on the page. 屬性會指出控制項是否共用的控制項 （相對於特定使用者控制項），也就是說，它網頁的所有使用者看見。The property indicates whether a control is a shared control (versus a user-specific control), meaning that it is visible to all users of a Web page. 屬性會指出控制項是否在目前包含-衍生區域 (例如)。The property indicates whether a control is currently contained in a -derived zone (such as ). 值為`false`指出控制項在區域內，因此會有完整的 Web 組件功能。A value of `false` indicates the control is inside a zone and thus has full Web Parts functionality. 屬性會指出控制項是否為靜態或動態。The property indicates whether a control is static or dynamic. 在網頁標記中宣告靜態控制項，而動態控制項以程式設計方式加入。A static control is declared in the markup of a Web page, whereas a dynamic control is added programmatically. 類別也提供數種方法，決定發生什麼情況的各個點上控制項的生命週期中。The class also provides several methods that determine what happens at various points in the control's life cycle. 例如，和方法兩者會覆寫衍生類別提供以程式設計方式控制對應至每個方法的名稱在事件期間呈現控制項的內容中。For example, the and methods can both be overridden in a derived class to provide programmatic control over the rendering of a control's contents during the event that corresponds to each method's name. 類別衍生自可以加入物件加入至集合。Classes that derive from can add objects to the collection. 動詞命令呈現在動詞命令功能表中，它會出現在標題列控制項。The verbs are rendered in a verbs menu, which appears in the title bar of a control. 物件會提供一般使用者動作，例如隱藏或最小化控制項或顯示說明簡單的 UI 項目。 objects provide simple UI elements for common user actions such as hiding or minimizing the control or displaying Help. 方法建立的任何自訂集合相關聯的控制項控制項。The method creates a collection of any custom controls that are associated with a control. 開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，使它會建立自訂控制項特別設計用來編輯其控制項。Developers can override this method so that it creates custom controls designed specifically to edit their control. 當使用者按一下編輯動詞命令時，呼叫方法控制項。The method is called when a user clicks the edit verb on a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制，並在網頁中參考它。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and reference it in a Web page. 此範例的第一個部分包含自訂程式碼控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of the example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控制項將示範如何建立簡單的自訂控制項可讓您存取功能的 Web 組件控制項集合。This control demonstrates how to create a simple custom control that gives you access to the features of the Web Parts control set. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例假設您的原始程式碼編譯為組件、 將它放在 Web 應用程式的 Bin 子資料夾和參考組件與`Register`在網頁指示詞。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何參考`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 網頁中的控制項。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 請注意，許多的各種屬性可以以宣告方式指派給自訂控制項。Notice that many of the various properties can be assigned declaratively to the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textwebpartvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會初始化數個 UI 導向的屬性，包括各種的預設值`Allow`屬性來判斷控制項的功能。The constructor initializes default values for several UI-oriented properties, including the various `Allow` properties that determine the control's capabilities. 這些屬性便會合併到繼承的類別執行個體。These properties are then incorporated into an inherited class instance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自控制項類別繼承的基底中設定的預設屬性值建構函式，但然後變更 衍生的控制項的建構函式中的一個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates how a control that derives from the class inherits the default property values set in the base constructor, but then changes the value of one property in the constructor of the derived control. 此範例中的第一個部分包含自訂程式碼控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控制項將示範如何建立簡單的自訂控制項可讓您存取功能的 Web 組件控制項集合。This control demonstrates how to create a simple custom control that gives you access to the features of the Web Parts control set. 請注意，在自訂控制項的建構函式`TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose`屬性設定為`false`，其中包含關閉 Web 網頁上的控制項時，防止使用者的影響。Note that in the constructor of the custom control, the `TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` property is set to `false`, which has the effect of preventing users from closing the control on a Web page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例假設您的原始程式碼編譯為組件、 將它放在 Web 應用程式的 Bin 子資料夾和參考組件與`Register`在網頁指示詞。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何參考`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 網頁中的控制項。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 您將頁面載入瀏覽器中，如果您按一下標題列的自訂動詞命令功能表之後控制項，關閉動詞命令現已停用，它可防止使用者關閉的控制項。After you load the page in a browser, if you click the verbs menu in the title bar of the custom control, the close verb is now disabled, which prevents users from closing the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textwebpartvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者關閉後在網頁上，控制項的控制項不再是可見或頁面上提供。After a user closes a control on a Web page, the control is no longer visible or available on the page. 已關閉的控制項加入至頁面類別目錄，這是一種 Web 組件的實體，儲存控制項的參考。The closed control is added to the page catalog, a Web Parts entity that stores a reference to the control. 如果開發人員加入控制項內的頁面控制項，使用者可將頁面切換至 類別目錄的顯示模式的頁面類別目錄中選取 已關閉的控制項，將它加入至網頁。If a developer adds a control to the page within a control, users are able to switch the page to catalog display mode, select the closed control in the page catalog, and add it back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 關閉控制項可以加回至網頁程式設計的方式，或從頁面類別目錄選取已關閉的控制項，當頁面類別目錄中的使用者顯示模式。A closed control can be added back to a page either programmatically, or by a user who selects the closed control from the page catalog when the page is in catalog display mode. 關閉控制項是不同於刪除它。Closing a control is different from deleting it. 永久移除已刪除的控制項時，可以回到頁面上，加入已關閉的控制項。A closed control can be added back to a page, while a deleted control is permanently removed. 如需有關刪除控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more information on deleting controls, see the method. 不同於隱藏它也是關閉的控制項。Closing a control is also different from hiding it. 隱藏的控制項是仍然在頁面上，仍然參與頁面生命週期事件，而只隱藏的使用者檢視，但是已關閉的控制項根本不呈現在網頁上。A control that is hidden is still present on the page, still participates in page life cycle events, and is only hidden from the user's view, but a closed control is not even rendered on a page. 靜態和動態可以關閉 （靜態控制項宣告在網頁標記中，而以程式設計方式新增動態控制項） 的控制項。Both static and dynamic controls (static controls are declared in a page's markup, while dynamic controls are added programmatically) can be closed. 如果開發人員設定屬性`false`、 關閉動詞命令不會出現在控制項上，使用者無法關閉的控制項。If a developer sets the property to `false`, a close verb does not appear on the control, and the user is not able to close the control. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更預設值為屬性自訂控制，使它無法關閉。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom control, so that it cannot be closed. 此範例中的第一個部分包含自訂程式碼控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 請注意，在自訂控制項的建構函式`TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose`屬性設定為`false`，其中包含關閉 Web 網頁上的控制項時，防止使用者的影響。Note that in the constructor of the custom control, the `TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` property is set to `false`, which has the effect of preventing users from closing the control on a Web page. 這表示控制項的動詞命令功能表上的關閉動詞命令會停用使用者。This means that the close verb on the verbs menu of the control will be disabled for users. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例假設您的原始程式碼編譯為組件、 將它放在 Web 應用程式的 Bin 子資料夾和參考組件與`Register`在網頁指示詞。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何參考`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 網頁中的控制項。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 請注意，在``參考控制項的項目，您無法變更控制項的建構函式所設定的屬性值。Note that in the `` element that references the control, you could also change the value of the property set by the control's constructor. 若要讓即將關閉的控制項，只要加入`AllowClose="true"`屬性設定為宣告式標記中的項目。To allow the control to be closed, simply add an `AllowClose="true"` attribute to the element in the declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在網頁標記中，或以程式設計方式，可以宣告方式設定屬性值。The property value can be set declaratively in page markup, or programmatically. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要允許使用者編輯控制項，屬性必須設定為`true`（預設值），和頁面的顯示模式必須處於編輯模式。To allow end users to edit a control, the property must be set to `true` (the default), and the page's display mode must be in edit mode. 顯示模式都由欄位控制項。Display modes are represented by fields in the control. 在此案例中的模式是。In this case, the mode is . 如需詳細資料頁面會顯示模式，以及如何變更它們，請參閱類別概觀。For details about page display modes and how to change them, see the class overview. 當屬性設定為`false`編輯選項以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式，會限制。When the property is set to `false` either declaratively or programmatically, editing options are limited. 只有在頁面的版面配置的變更可能的編輯作業，使用控制項或透過自訂來啟用其他基本作業控制項。The only possible editing operations are changes to the page's layout, using a control, or other basic operations enabled through custom controls. 如需範例，會使用控制項從 Web 組件控制項設定，並示範如何啟用編輯自訂的 Web 組件控制項，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立 Web 組件頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e05b659c-d6da-46cb-b177-48efe55f2770)。For an example that uses controls from the Web Parts control set and shows how to enable editing of a custom Web Parts control, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e05b659c-d6da-46cb-b177-48efe55f2770). > [!IMPORTANT] > 效果的屬性對控制項的行為也會受到目前個人化範圍的網頁上，以及該頁面上的控制項，個別的 Web 組件。The effect that the property has on a control's behavior is also impacted by the current personalization scope of the Web page, and the individual Web Parts controls on that page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更預設值為控制項，Web 組件的屬性，以便不能編輯控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a Web Parts control, so that the control cannot be edited. 這個範例假設使用控制項， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例也會使用自訂使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 使用者控制項藉由參考`Register`最上方的裝載使用者控制項的網頁指示詞。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 如需如何建立這個使用者控制項及使用顯示模式的詳細說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在網頁的宣告式標記上``參考控制項的項目附註`AllowEdit="false"`屬性。In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowEdit="false"` attribute. 雖然`true`是預設值，將屬性設`false`針對此範例的目的。Although `true` is the default, the attribute has been set to `false` for the purposes of this example. 載入網頁瀏覽器，並使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，以變更至編輯模式的顯示模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Modes** drop-down list control to change the display mode to edit mode. 接下來，按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表控制，並記下編輯動詞命令的已遺失，因為您停用編輯控制項上。Next, click the verbs menu in the title bar of the control, and note that the edit verb is missing, because you disabled editing on the control. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許使用者隱藏 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users are allowed to hide a control.

value.span: 如果 控制項可以隱藏，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control can be hidden; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定使用者是否可以修改屬性。The property determines whether users can modify the property. 在預設情況下，屬性值時`true`，編輯控制項時，使用者可以變更值。In the default case, when the property value is `true`, users can change the value when the control is being edited. 根據預設，未隱藏控制項及其屬性值是`false`。By default, controls are not hidden and their property value is `false`. 當控制項正在編輯中，如果使用者選取核取方塊，以隱藏控制項 (將屬性`true`)，控制項將不再顯示頁面回到瀏覽模式時。When a control is being edited, if a user selects a check box to hide the control (which sets the property to `true`), the control will no longer be visible when the page returns to browse mode. 隱藏的控制項是不同的關閉的控制項，因為屬性具有 Web 組件控制項集合內的不同意義。Hidden controls are distinct from controls that are closed, because the property has a distinct meaning within the Web Parts control set. 關閉的控制項也不會轉譯在頁面上，並不會參與頁面生命週期事件。Closed controls are not even rendered on a page, and do not participate in page life cycle events. 相較之下，而隱藏控制項不會對使用者顯示，，仍然會轉譯在網頁上，仍然會包含在區域時，便可以維持連線與其他控制項做為 Web 組件的應用程式的一部分。In contrast, while hidden controls are not visible to users, they are still rendered on a Web page, are still contained in a zone, and can still maintain connections with other controls as part of a Web Parts application. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更預設值為自訂屬性 Web 組件控制項，以便使用者不會隱藏自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the custom control cannot be hidden by a user. 這個範例假設使用自訂控制項， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例也會使用自訂使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 使用者控制項藉由參考`Register`最上方的裝載使用者控制項的網頁指示詞。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 如需如何建立這個使用者控制項及使用顯示模式的詳細說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在網頁的宣告式標記上``參考控制項的項目附註`AllowHide="false"`屬性，可防止使用者編輯控制項無法隱藏它。In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowHide="false"` attribute, which prevents a user who is editing the control from being able to hide it. 載入網頁瀏覽器，並使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，以變更至編輯模式的顯示模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to edit mode. 接下來，按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表控制項，按一下 編輯動詞命令。Next, click the verbs menu in the title bar of the control and click the edit verb. 由於會顯示 編輯使用者介面 (UI)，您可以看到編輯 UI屬性現在已經停用，因為您設定的發生屬性值設定為`false`。As the edit user interface (UI) is displayed, you can see that the UI to edit the property is now disabled, which occurred because you set the property value to `false`. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/CS/allowhidecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/VB/allowhidevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，如果設定為`false`，防止使用者的最小化控制項不會出現在控制項的標題列中最小化控制項，以及使用者介面 (UI)。The property, if set to `false`, prevents an end user from being able to minimize the control, and the user interface (UI) for minimizing the control does not appear in the control's title bar. 在 Web 組件詞彙中，當屬性設定為`false`，最小化動詞命令未出現在控制項的動詞命令功能表。In Web Parts terminology, when the property is set to `false`, the minimize verb does not appear on the control's verbs menu. 當使用者將控制項降到最低時，它會減少到顯示中只有部分控制項的標題列和標題的最小區域控制項的大小。When a user minimizes a control, it reduces the control's size down to a minimal area that displays only part of the control's title bar and title. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更預設值為屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項，使控制項無法由使用者最小化。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the control cannot be minimized by a user. 這個範例假設使用自訂控制項， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 在網頁的宣告式標記上``參考控制項的項目附註`AllowMinimize="false"`屬性中的最小化動詞會隱藏控制項的動詞命令功能表，並可防止使用者能夠以最小化控制項。In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowMinimize="false"` attribute, which hides the minimize verb in the control's verbs menu, and prevents a user from being able to minimize the control. 載入網頁瀏覽器，然後按一下動詞命令功能表控制項。Load the page in a browser, and click the verbs menu on the control. 最小化動詞命令，通常就是出現在 [動作] 功能表上，會隱藏，因為您在控制項的宣告式標記停用。The minimize verb, which would normally be present on the verbs menu, is hidden because you disabled it in the declarative markup for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize/CS/allowminimizecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize/VB/allowminimizevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，網頁會顯示模式，可讓版面配置的變更 （例如編輯或設計模式），使用者可以變更頁面配置將控制項移到另一個頁面上的區域。When the property is `true`, and a Web page is in a display mode that allows layout changes (such as edit or design mode), a user can change the page layout by moving a control to another zone on the page. 如果屬性設定為`false`，無法在區域之間移動控制項，但仍然可以在其目前的區域內移動。If the property is set to `false`, a control cannot be moved between zones, but can still be moved within its current zone. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更預設值為自訂的 Web 組件的屬性控制，好讓使用者無法將控制項移至不同的區域。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that an end user cannot move the control to a different zone. 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例也會使用自訂使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 使用者控制項藉由參考`Register`最上方的裝載使用者控制項的網頁指示詞。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 如需如何建立這個使用者控制項及使用顯示模式的詳細說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在網頁上，在第二個的宣告式標記``項目時，請注意`AllowZoneChange="false"`屬性。In the declarative markup for the Web Page, on the second `` element, note the `AllowZoneChange="false"` attribute. 在執行階段，使用者可以拖曳到第一個控制項**WebPartZone2**，但無法執行相同的第二個控制項。At run time, an end user could drag the first control into **WebPartZone2**, but could not do the same with the second control. 載入網頁瀏覽器，並使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，以變更至設計模式的顯示模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to design mode. 嘗試拖曳每個控制項至另一個區域，並記下的值不同的行為及其屬性。Try to drag each of the controls into another zone, and note the different behavior based on the values of their properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange/CS/allowzonechangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange/VB/allowzonechangevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回目前的值，或是屬性，或如果此控制項有沒有標題，導出值。The property returns either the current value of the property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value. 計算的值包含未命名的控制項，可當地語系化的資源字串，加上數字 （如果有多個區域中的控制項），根據區域中控制項的索引。The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls, plus (if there are multiple controls within the zone) a number based on the index of the control within the zone. 自訂控制 where已覆寫屬性來傳回字串值來做為子標題，屬性就會產生完整的標題的副標題與串連。For custom controls where the property has been overridden to return a string value to use as a subtitle, the property is concatenated with the subtitle to produce a complete title. 屬性值也可做為工具提示出現時的一部分使用者位置滑鼠指標到控制項的標題列。The property value also serves as part of a ToolTip that appears when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title bar of a control. 完整的工具提示組成值，後面接著連字號後, 接控制項的值屬性。The full ToolTip consists of the value, followed by a hyphen, followed by the value of the control's property.

請注意，針對匯出的程式碼範例能夠運作，您也必須更新 Web.config 檔案加入屬性`enableExport="true"`至``項目，如 < 備註 > 一節所示。Note that for the export code example to work, you must also update your Web.config file by adding the attribute `enableExport="true"` to the `` element, as indicated in the Remarks section. 此範例中的第一個部分包含名為控制項的程式碼`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控制項是自訂控制項的範例 > 一節中找到相同類別概觀，不同之處在於它會新增`Personalizable`屬性`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`屬性，因此可以匯出的屬性。This control is the same as the custom control that is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it adds a `Personalizable` attribute to the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property so the property can be exported. 請注意，屬性宣告包含值為`true`如`isSensitive`參數，這表示屬性已標示為機密資料的匯出之用。Note that the attribute declaration includes a value of `true` for the `isSensitive` parameter, meaning that the property is marked as sensitive data for export purposes. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例假設您的原始程式碼編譯為組件、 將它放在 Web 應用程式的 Bin 子資料夾和參考組件與`Register`在網頁指示詞。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何參考`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 網頁中的控制項。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 請注意，在宣告式標記屬性值設定為，這表示將會匯出甚至機密值的屬性。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to , meaning that even properties with sensitive values will be exported. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/exportmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/exportmodevb.aspx#1)] 載入網頁瀏覽器中，在和上的動詞命令功能表控制項、 按一下 匯出動詞命令，並遵循的指示匯出包含控制項的狀態和屬性資料的說明檔案。Load the Web page in a browser, and on the verbs menu of the control, click the export verb and follow the instructions to export a description file containing the control's state and property data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Internet Explorer 轉譯模式可能會影響的高度控制項和包含該區域的高度。Internet Explorer rendering modes can affect the height of a control and the height of the zone that contains it. Internet Explorer 中相容性模式 （回溯相容於舊版瀏覽器） 或標準模式中，呈現網頁 (取決於是否存在`DOCTYPE`頁面中的宣告)。Internet Explorer renders Web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions) or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page). 這些模式的相關資訊，請參閱 DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)屬性。For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property. 當 Internet Explorer 會呈現標準模式中的頁面時，在某些情況下它可能未調整儲存格大小在資料表中，即使是儲存格的 HTML 標記``。When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, under some circumstances it might not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is ``. 如此一來，控制項和其包含的區域會轉譯，讓控制項執行自動縮放以內部網路區域的全部高度。As a result, controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone. 在標準模式中 Internet Explorer 時，控制項不會呈現要延伸到其完整的高度，在下列情況：When Internet Explorer is in standard mode, controls do not render to stretch to their full height in the following cases: - 當區域屬性設定為和您在區域上明確設定高度。When a zone's property is set to and you explicitly set the height on the zone. 若要啟用控制項填滿區域的全部高度，請勿指定水平方向的區域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontally oriented zone. - 當區域屬性設定為且未明確設定的區域，或包含的控制項的高度。When a zone's property is set to and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone or of the contained controls. 若要啟用控制項填滿區域的全部高度，請在垂直方向的區域中設定或控制項的區域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertically oriented zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何轉譯問題影響的高度控制項。The following code example demonstrates the rendering issue that affects the height of controls in a . 為了示範此問題，您必須執行 Internet Explorer 中的頁面。To demonstrate this issue, you must run the page in Internet Explorer. 請注意該區域的方向會設定為水平的而且區域和控制項的高度未明確設定。Note that the zone's orientation is set to horizontal, and that the height of the zone and the controls within it is not set explicitly. 結果是在越短、控制項沒有延伸到在呈現時區域的高度。The result is that in the , the shorter control does not stretch to the height of the zone upon rendering. 不過，如果您移除`DOCTYPE`宣告從頁面和頁面執行一次，不會發生問題，因為現在瀏覽器將不會呈現標準模式中的頁面。However, if you remove the `DOCTYPE` declaration from the page and run the page again, the issue does not occur, because now the browser will not render the page in standards mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Height#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Height/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Height#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Height/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] （如 < 備註 > 一節所述） 的因應措施的運作方式，請再次嘗試新增`height`屬性``項目，同時保留`DOCTYPE`頁面中的宣告。To see how the workaround (described in the Remarks section) works, try adding a `height` attribute to the `` element, while keeping the `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page. 若要將屬性加入至標記，您可以使用下列程式碼：You can use the following code to add the attribute to the tag: `Height="200px"` 執行頁面，而且現在都控制自動縮放以填滿區域的明確宣告的高度。Run the page, and now both controls stretch to fill the explicitly declared height of the zone. 您也可以試驗這個程式碼範例，可以發現在其他案例中，它發生於高度相關的轉譯問題時該區域的設。You can also experiment with this code example to observe the height-related rendering issue in the other scenario, which occurs when the zone's is set to . 移除現有`LayoutOrientation`屬性和其值從``項目，這會造成區域的方向，若要還原為預設的垂直方向。Remove the existing `LayoutOrientation` attribute and its value from the `` element, which will cause the zone's orientation to revert to the default vertical orientation. 上設定的高度屬性``200 個像素，為您的項目未上方，並執行網頁。Set the height attribute on the `` element to 200 pixels, as you did above, and run the page. 區域的高度看起來太大，而且控制項的大小不會按比例為區域的高度。The zone's height looks too large, and the controls are not sized proportionately to the zone's height. 現在移除高度屬性，然後再次執行頁面。Now remove the height attribute and run the page again. 控制項現在會呈現相對於內部網路區域的高度。The controls now render relative to the height of the zone.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷瀏覽器顯示控制項的說明內容的方式。Use the property to determine how a browser will display Help content for a control. 下表列出各種說明模式的影響，在瀏覽器上當說明 內容顯示控制項。The following table lists the effects of the various Help modes on a browser when Help content for a control is displayed. |說明模式Help mode|瀏覽器的行為Browser behavior| |---------------|----------------------| ||如果瀏覽器有此功能，要另外開啟瀏覽器視窗。Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability. 使用者必須先關閉視窗，才能回到 Web 組件頁面。A user must close the window before returning to the Web Parts page.| ||如果瀏覽器有此功能，要另外開啟瀏覽器視窗。Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability. 使用者不需要關閉視窗，就能返回 Web 網頁。A user does not have to close the window before returning to the Web page.| ||取代瀏覽器視窗中的 Web 組件頁面。Replaces the Web Parts page in the browser window.| 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示相同的瀏覽器視窗中控制項的說明。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display Help for a control in the same browser window. 此範例中的第一個部分會假設使用的自訂控制， `TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。The first part of this example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例也包含 HTML 網頁，其中包含虛構的說明內容`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The code example also includes an HTML page that contains fictitious Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 要讓範例能夠運作，您必須將下列程式碼儲存在名為 Textwebparthelp.htm 檔案，並將它放在您的站台的.aspx 網頁與相同的目錄。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 此範例的最後一個部分會示範如何建立參考的網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The final part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 請注意，在宣告式標記中，屬性值設定為，此程式碼也會設定的值和屬性的 HTML 檔案，其中包含說明內容的名稱。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to , and the code also sets the value of the property to the name of the HTML file that contains the Help content. 載入網頁瀏覽器，並按 [說明] 動作的動詞命令功能表上控制項。Load the page into a browser, and click the help verb on the verbs menu of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項是隱藏的仍會留在其區域中，實際上會轉譯在其頁面上，並參與頁面生命週期階段例如`PreRender`階段，即使在瀏覽器中看不到。A control that is hidden remains in its zone, is actually rendered on its page, and participates in page life cycle phases such as the `PreRender` phase, even though it is not visible in a browser. 這點不同於已關閉，因為已關閉的控制項根本沒有呈現在頁面上，但使用者看不到，雖然隱藏的控制項轉譯和 Web 組件的應用程式中作用中的控制項。This is different from controls that are closed, because closed controls are not even rendered on a page, while hidden controls are rendered and active in Web Parts applications, though not visible to users. Web 組件控制項集合會隱藏藉由設定其階層式樣式表 (CSS) 樣式的值控制`display:none`。The Web Parts control set hides the control by setting its cascading style sheet (CSS) style to a value of `display:none`. 即使控制項的屬性設定為`true`，如果目前的顯示模式，在頁面可讓要顯示隱藏的控制項，仍會顯示控制項。Even if the property for a control is set to `true`, the control is still displayed if the current display mode on the page allows hidden controls to be displayed. 例如，編輯模式可讓要顯示隱藏的控制項，以便使用者可以編輯它們。For example, edit mode allows hidden controls to be displayed, so that users can edit them. 在某些顯示模式顯示隱藏的控制項時，控制項的標題會顯示，指出控制項處於隱藏狀態的字串。When hidden controls are visible in certain display modes, the title of the control displays a string indicating that the control is in hidden status. 當屬性控制設為 `false`、 預設值、 在頁面上顯示的控制項。When the property on a control is set to `false`, which is the default, the control is displayed on the page. 請注意，如果屬性設定為`false`，不允許使用者編輯屬性值。Note that if the property is set to `false`, end users are not allowed to edit the property value. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property for a custom Web Parts control. 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，在網頁中的宣告式標記``項目，`Hidden`屬性值設為`true`。Notice that in the Web page, in the declarative markup for the `` element, the `Hidden` attribute value is set to `true`. `TextDisplayWebPart`控制項不會出現在瀏覽器中載入的頁面。The `TextDisplayWebPart` control will not appear if the page is loaded in a browser. 不過，此控制項是仍會出現在頁面上，在其區域中，而且仍然無法參與連線與其他控制，如果您建立這些連線。However, the control is still present on the page and in its zone, and it still could participate in connections with other controls if you created those connections. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Hidden#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Hidden/CS/hiddencs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Hidden#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Hidden/VB/hiddenvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您設定當使用者嘗試將組件控制項的說明檔案匯入 Web 組件控制項的類別目錄時，發生錯誤時顯示的自訂錯誤訊息。The property allows you to set a custom error message that is displayed if an error occurs when a user tries to import a part control's description file into a catalog of Web Parts controls. 您可以設定屬性，以宣告方式在控制，請加入`ImportErrorMessage`控制項和錯誤訊息字串指派給它的開頭標記內的屬性。You can set the property declaratively on a control, adding the `ImportErrorMessage` attribute within the opening tag of the control and assigning an error message string to it. 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. 如需完整的程式碼範例，示範如何匯出及匯入。Web 組件描述檔案控制項，其中包括使用屬性，請參閱類別。For a full code example that demonstrates both exporting and importing .WebPart description files for controls, which includes use of the property, see the class. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A已關閉的控制項不會轉譯頁面上，不會參與網頁事件。A control that is closed is not rendered on the page and does not participate in page events. 不過，它由 Web 組件應用程式頁面類別目錄中維護，而且可以加入至網頁的使用者提供適當的使用者介面 (UI)。However, it is maintained in a page catalog by the Web Parts application, and can be added back to the page by users if the appropriate user interface (UI) is provided. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共用的 Web 組件控制項使用者都可以看到所有的網頁。A shared Web Parts control is visible to all users of a Web page. 共用控制的相反是每個使用者控制項，這是特定使用者只能看見該控制項加入至頁面的使用者。The opposite of a shared control is a per-user control, which is user-specific and is visible only to the user who added that control to a page. 如果使用者共用的個人化範圍中檢視網頁時，會加入一個動態控制項，控制項將會共用。If a dynamic control is added while a user is viewing the page in shared personalization scope, the control will be shared. 如果控制項已加入但使用者卻使用者個人化範圍，該控制項的屬性值將是`false`。If the control is added while the user is in user personalization scope, the property value for that control will be `false`. 如需有關共用和每個使用者控制項，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information about shared and per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property for a custom Web Parts control. 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 當您載入網頁瀏覽器，並按一下**檢查共用**按鈕，這個程式碼會檢查屬性`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項和屬性的值是`true`，因為參考的控制項為靜態控制項中頁面的宣告式的標記。When you load the Web page in a browser and click the **Check Sharing** button, the code checks the property on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and the value of the property is `true`, because the control is referenced as a static control in the declarative markup of the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_IsShared#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_IsShared/CS/issharedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_IsShared#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_IsShared/VB/issharedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 設定旗標，指出已變更目前 控制項執行個體的個人化資料。

span.span: Sets a flag indicating that personalization data has changed for the current control instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定旗標，表示，已變更控制項狀態資料 （個人） 上控制項，而且控制項因此需要保存的長期儲存到個人化資料。The method sets a flag indicating that control state data has been changed (personalized) on a control, and that the control therefore needs to persist the personalization data to long term storage. 通常個人化變更保存在控制項，而不需要開發人員呼叫方法。Normally the persists personalization changes on controls without a need for developers to call the method. 但有兩種情況下，開發人員需要呼叫這個方法。But there are two cases in which developers do need to call this method. 第一個案例中是 HTTP 時變更控制項狀態資料時`GET`網頁要求。The first case is when control state data is changed during an HTTP `GET` request to a page. 根據預設，控制項狀態資料變更期間`GET`要求不會保存 （基於安全性目的）。By default, changes to control state data during a `GET` request are not persisted (for security purposes). 但是方法可用來保存合法的個人化變更控制在此情況下。But the method provides a way to persist legitimate personalization changes to controls in this case. 呼叫的第二個情況方法時發生 HTTP`POST`網頁要求。The second case for calling the method occurs during an HTTP `POST` request to a page. 如果控制項具有複雜可個人化的屬性 (例如屬性，其中包含物件)，以及在這些屬性的控制項狀態資料個人化期間`POST`要求時，開發人員必須呼叫若要確保所做的變更會保存的方法。If a control has complex personalizable properties (such as a property that contains an object), and control state data in those properties is personalized during a `POST` request, developers must call the method to ensure that the changes are persisted.

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性選擇性地在您的自訂傳回標準副標題字串控制項，將會附加至控制項的標題。Use the property optionally to return a standard subtitle string in your custom control that will be appended to the control's title. 如果您提供的值中自訂屬性控制項，Web 組件控制項集合會自動將它附加到的值屬性，以建立完整的標題控制項。If you provide a value for the property in a custom control, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the property to create a complete title for the control. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何提供的子標題的自訂執行個體控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to provide a subtitle for instances of a custom control. 此範例中的第一個部分包含名為自訂控制項的程式碼`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控制項是自訂控制項的範例 > 一節中找到相同類別概觀，不同之處在於它也會覆寫屬性以提供標準副標題包含虛構的公司名稱的執行個體自訂控制項。This control is the same as the custom control which is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it also overrides the property to provide a standard subtitle containing a fictitious company name for instances of the custom control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例假設您的原始程式碼編譯為組件、 將它放在 Web 應用程式的 Bin 子資料夾和參考組件與`Register`在網頁指示詞。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 此範例的第二部分會示範如何建立參考的網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`ASP.NET 網頁中的控制項。The second part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，控制項的標題列文字包含指派給宣告式標記、 連字號分隔字元和值的自訂子標題，從控制項的標題`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。After you load the page in a browser, the control's title bar text includes the title assigned to the control in the declarative markup, a hyphen separator, and the value of the custom subtitle from the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/CS/subtitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/VB/subtitlevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果開發人員指派將值屬性，則該值會判斷所有 （或至少一部分） 控制項的標題列中的文字。If a developer assigns a value to the property, then that value determines all (or at least part of) the text in the control's title bar. 標題文字也會顯示為工具提示文字的一部分時，您將滑鼠指標置於的標題列控制項或出現在其他伺服器控制項區域。The title text also appears as part of the ToolTip text when you position your mouse pointer over the title bar of a control or other server control that appears in a zone. 控制項的標題列中顯示的完整文字也受到屬性。The complete text displayed in a control's title bar is also affected by the property. 如果該屬性指派給它的值，此值就會串連至標題。If that property has a value assigned to it, the value is concatenated to the title. 如果不指定任何值給屬性的導出的標題會顯示。If no value is assigned to the property, a calculated title is displayed. 開發人員可以在任何時間點，擷取中顯示的實際、 總數文字所取得的值的控制項的標題列屬性。At any point, developers can retrieve the actual, total text displayed in a control's title bar by getting the value of the property. 標題文字的樣式由屬性包含組件控制項的區域。The style of the title text is determined by the property of the zone that contains the part control. 如需示範如何使用基底屬性的程式碼範例，請參閱屬性。For a code example that demonstrates the use of the base property, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指派的 URL屬性、 控制項的標題會變成控制項的補充資訊的連結。When you assign a URL to the property, the title of the control becomes a link to supplemental information about the control. 當頁面顯示模式，其中可以拖曳控制項，例如設計、 編輯或類別目錄的模式，就不會轉譯 URL。The URL is not rendered when the page is in a display mode where controls can be dragged, such as design, edit, or catalog mode. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 個人化範圍，這個屬性會設定為，而且只能由授權的使用者可以修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property for a custom Web Parts control. 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`，其中的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，``元素包含`TitleUrl`虛構的 url 屬性。Notice that the `` element contains the `TitleUrl` attribute with a fictitious URL. 如果您將頁面載入瀏覽器中的標題控制項現在是指向資源的連結屬性。If you load the page in a browser, the title of the control is now a link to the resource pointed to by the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 動詞命令是衍生自類別，並提供使用者介面 (UI) 動作，使用者可以在上執行控制項。Verbs derive from the class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a control. 通常動詞命令會在 UI 中以按鈕、 連結或功能表項目表示。Usually verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items. 預設情況下，通用 Web 組件動詞命令，會出現在下拉式清單動詞命令功能表中每個控制項的標題列。By default, common Web Parts verbs appear on a drop-down verbs menu in each control's title bar. 沒有開啟、 關閉、 編輯和最小化控制項，以及用於匯出的定義控制項或載入的說明檔的其他指令動詞的標準動詞命令。There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file. 中不包含這些動詞集合，因為集合包含只有自訂的動詞命令，您建立並傳回所覆寫衍生類別中的這個屬性。These verbs are not included in the collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs that you create and return by overriding this property in a derived class. 當您建立自訂動詞命令，並將其新增至集合，然後您可以存取的動詞命令，以程式設計方式從控制項。When you create custom verbs and add them to the collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property for a custom Web Parts control. 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，工作的程式碼範例，您必須新增設定，若要啟用匯出 Web 組件描述檔案的 Web.config 檔案中。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 確定您具有網頁上的相同目錄中的 Web.config 檔案，此程式碼範例。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 內``區段中，請確定沒有``具有項目`enableExport`屬性設為`true`，在下列標記中。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 載入網頁瀏覽器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 當您按一下**顯示動詞計數** 按鈕，存取屬性，即可取得的自訂動詞命令計數`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後在標籤中顯示計數。When you click the **Display Verb Count** button, it accesses the property to get the count of custom verbs for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and displays the count in a label. 因為沒有自訂動詞命令已加入至控制項在此情況下，計數為零。Because no custom verbs have been added to the control in this case, the count is zero. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Verbs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Verbs/CS/verbscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Verbs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Verbs/VB/verbsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件頁面一律擁有的單一執行個體控制項。A Web Parts page always has a single instance of a control. 控制追蹤和管理所有其他 Web 組件頁面上的控制項，包括衍生自基底的所有區域類別和衍生自基底的所有組件控制項類別。The control tracks and manages all the other Web Parts controls on a page, including all zones that derive from the base class, and all part controls that derive from the base class. 屬性存在，讓每個與相關聯控制項及其控制項。The property exists so that every control can be associated with its control. 控制項，接著，會維護所有的集合在頁面上的控制項及其集合。The control, in turn, maintains a collection of all the controls on a page in its collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 組件控制項集合的架構中，控制項才可以有 Web 組件功能它們作業內的區域。In the architecture of the Web Parts control set, controls can have Web Parts functionality only if they operate inside of zones. 標準網頁上使用的區域是控制項。The standard zone to use on Web pages is the control. 雖然使用者可以在網頁上的不同區域之間移動 Web 組件控制項，控制項的指定執行個體可位於只有一個區域中，一次。Although end users can move Web Parts controls between different zones on a Web page, a given instance of a control can reside in only one zone at a time. Web 組件控制項，以及其相關聯控制，請使用來追蹤目前的區域控制項的屬性所在，以及一般區域的版面配置和樣式特性套用到包含的所有 Web 組件控制項。A Web Parts control, and its associated control, use the property to keep track of which zone the control currently resides in, and what common layout and style characteristics of the zone apply to all contained Web Parts controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取和屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to access the and properties for a custom Web Parts control. 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例包含自訂使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。The code example includes a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 使用者控制項藉由參考`Register`最上方的裝載使用者控制項的網頁指示詞。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 如需如何建立這個使用者控制項及使用顯示模式的詳細說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 有兩個``元素在頁面上，每個都代表 Web 組件區域。There are two `` elements on the page, each representing a Web Parts zone. 第一個區域包含標準控制項的作用就像控制在執行階段，因為它是在區域中。The first zone contains a standard control, which acts like a control at run time because it is in a zone. 第二個區域包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The second zone contains the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 當使用者按一下**區域資訊** 按鈕，`Label1`控制項顯示的值控制項屬性和區域目前包含控制項的屬性。When a user clicks the **Zone Information** button, the `Label1` control displays the values of the property for the control, and the property of the zone that currently contains the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/CS/webpartzoneindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/VB/webpartzoneindexvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項在其區域中的索引位置。

span.span: Gets the index position of a control within its zone.

value.span: 控制項在其區域中的數值順序。

span.span: The numerical order of a control within its zone.

value.span: 區域中第一個控制項的索引值為零。

span.span: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示 Web 組件控制項的數字的順序 （或序數位置） 在其區域中，區域中其他控制項的相對位置。The property indicates a Web Parts control's numerical order (or ordinal position) within its zone, relative to other controls in the zone. 控制項使用這個屬性來追蹤和管理它的 Web 網頁上的 Web 組件控制項集合。The control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不能假設的值控制項的屬性將會等於相同的控制項內的索引值控制項的內部網路區域的集合。You cannot assume that the value of the property for a control will equal the index value for the same control within the collection of the control's zone. 通常控制項的相對位置的區域中 (其值)，和它的索引內其區域中，集合將會是不同的值，加入及移除區域的控制項時。Often a control's relative position in its zone (its value), and its index within the collection of its zone, will be different values as controls are added to and removed from zones. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取和屬性自訂 Web 組件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to access the and properties for a custom Web Parts control. 這個範例假設自訂的控制項，使用`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中建立、類別概觀。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例包含自訂使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。The code example includes a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 使用者控制項藉由參考`Register`最上方的裝載使用者控制項的網頁指示詞。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 如需如何建立這個使用者控制項及使用顯示模式的詳細說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 有兩個``元素在頁面上，每個都代表 Web 組件區域。There are two `` elements on the page, each representing a Web Parts zone. 第一個區域包含標準控制項的作用就像控制在執行階段，因為它是在區域中。The first zone contains a standard control, which acts like a control at run time because it is in a zone. 第二個區域包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The second zone contains the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 當使用者按一下**區域資訊** 按鈕，`Label1`控制項顯示的值控制項屬性和區域目前包含控制項的屬性。When a user clicks the **Zone Information** button, the `Label1` control displays the values of the property for the control, and the property of the zone that currently contains the control.
